website_summaries.verdict: A terrific knife bag for home and professional chefs alike.
pros: Metal zippers close bag on three sides
Combination of nylon and padding for outstanding blend of durability and comfort
cons: Less storage space than comparable bags

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought the knife roll because I find that I am always traveling to Airbnb, camping, the beach, etc. And I always find that the knives they have are pitiful and incomplete. This is a safe way to carry the tools I need to enjoy cooking on vacation. It's compact enough to make it easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect for your chef's equipment
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for this wonderful knife roll! I'm able to have my filet knife, chefs knife, carving knife and paring knife along with odds n' ins like spatulas, tongs and such. It rolls up nicely and with the shoulder strap, I can throw this over my shoulder with no problems or worries about things falling out or getting stabbed by the knifes. Very well made and would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: C. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: The descriprion says that it holds a knife up to 18 inches long. My 14 inch cimeter knife sticks out about 2 inches. I am working out the return. If i get it I will delete this bad review but it will still be missleading to others.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Olaiz Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good construction; Well designed; Durable; Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price; perhaps worth *more* than the price. This case is more spacious and better designed than I expected. It's spacious, without wasting space. It also has little sleeves and a large mesh zipper pocket to hold the not-knife stuff (thermometer, timer, vegetable peeler, etc). I bought the 8-pocket version. It holds more than eight knives, though, because each pocket can safely hold two small knives. I keep a 4-inch paring and 4-inch utility knife in one pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Some of these bags do not include a strap.
customer_reviews.text: Meh it’s fine. I’m a meat cutter and the main reason I got this small knife bag is to go from job to job and just slim it over my shoulder. I was under the impression that it can with a shoulder strap and it did not. Will end up just getting a different bag unless they want to replace mine with one that has a strap.
customer_reviews.author: Squeakers.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: After owning and using the bag daily for work, for a year, I’d say it does what I want from it. The only drawback I have had was that I recently had to re-stitch the Velcro square back onto the inside of the bag. Opening it repeatedly tore the original stitching out. Other than that it works great just buy some Messermeister knife guards so your knife edges aren’t smacking against your steel when you toss it on a shelf, like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my needs at all.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to protect my knives and the blades. This is just canvas and as my knife slips in and out it will slice through the stitching of the pockets. This is not adequate at all. So I bought a knife blade protector and out it on the blade and intended to just use this as a carrying case but then the knife wouldn't fit into any of the pockets. I found this useless and am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mudd

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, if you want something great spend the money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro on the handle came apart shortly after buying. The rest of the bag still feels sturdy. The only other complaint is that it doesn’t fully open so it’s sometimes difficult to take out my honing rod. It’s easy to use, wish it came with something more to hold knifes so they don’t come out of slots during transit. The bag in my opinion is what I paid for, nothing more nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Misael Balderas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got this roll after getting a job in a hotel kitchen. Didn't need the full roll that I had used in culinary school. I wanted something sturdy, but paired down to those handful of things I needed on a daily. This is it. Just a fraction of the size of my original roll, its also a heavy canvas with solid zippers. Barring accident, can't see why this roll wouldn't last for years.
customer_reviews.author: scribbler

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any cook
customer_reviews.text: This bag is an absolute beast. It’s made out of very heavy duty material and keeps my knives in place no matter how much it’s moved around or tossed up on shelves
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for holding knives
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. My only issue with the bag is that all the knives are stored on one side which makes the weight distribution off and it's kind of awkward to carry. Other than that I am happy to have a place to keep my knives safe and transport them easily!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Harris

customer_reviews.title: just ok bag
customer_reviews.text: bag is nice size, zipper works so far had for few months and already the stiching for the velcro that hold the two handles together has already unstiched . I take to work take knifes out for work thats it use velcro once a day to close. just was not stiched very well at all .
customer_reviews.author: Karen F Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Good value, glad to have opted for this one over more expensive knife bags.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after deciding that a $100, 21-pocket knife bag was overkill for me. The bag seems durable, with good quality fabric and strong zippers. The layout inside is good, and the whole thing folds into a small, easy to carry size. It's a big larger than I expected, but that's fine because it fit my largest knife perfectly. Also a bit on the bulky side once you fill it with knives - that's not a bad thing either. All in all, great value for a no-frills knife bag which comes with a reasonable number of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: John Chen

customer_reviews.title: I love Dahlstrong knive. I have purchased many.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered five knives as a gift. You can be proud gifting Dahlstrong knives. They are a tight squeeze in the Messermeister bag with the plastic blade guards, but the guards protect them from causing damage to the other knives.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: My favorite color from a brand I trust
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 other knife storage rolls from this brand before and I haven’t been disappointed yet. I love how durable they are and I love being able to express my personality by having a totally different looking bag than everyone else at work.
customer_reviews.author: The Dani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a portable side/pantry chefs knife roll.
customer_reviews.text: I rate this knife roll 4 1/2 stars. I love the olive color, it is compact, light weight, easily portable and stored. It fits everything you need on the go and is well designed. The only complaint I have is its durability. It could be a bit stronger and reinforced in the pockets, as without a knife guard on my paring knives, I have made swiss cheese out a few spots. I have yet to find good guards for them. Any suggestions? Overall, I love this knife roll. That's why I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. I’d suggest getting blade covers to keep your knives sharp. But this is perfect for 5 large knives. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: since my husband is on a mission to rid the world of crappy dull knives
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to transport knives and sharpener kit to daily and friends houses, since my husband is on a mission to rid the world of crappy dull knives :-). It's much larger than i anticipated, but i stink at estimating size from measurements. Durable, high quality, easy to carry in hand or with the included strap. The only knife we struggled with was a butcher knife, that is stocky and top heavy, but still made it work. Good for storage of infrequently used knives, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this knife roll. Lots of storage compartments for knives and other things such as pens, thermometers, bus cards, etc. also comes with a sturdy strap. I am more than pleased. It exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Meat Cutter Approved
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend uses it at work and he raves about it all the time. He is able to fit all 5 of his knives and 2 sharpening steels.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: replaced an old one i had with the exact same one. old one lasted about 4 years and 150 catering jobs. . colors are perfect with my logo. love the biz card slot on the outside and little zipper pouch inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E. Jurist

customer_reviews.title: Get organized.
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever had just a plastic bag to carry your dismemberment tools in ? Well look no further, this will help you carry all those sharp stabby objects, so you dont have to leak any of your own blood aside from the "animals" blood you're already covered in.
customer_reviews.author: Ian lukas

customer_reviews.title: ... undergone alot in a few months and has handled great my husband is a little rough so i was ...
customer_reviews.text: i got this bag for my husband he has many very expensive and sharp knifes and was in desperate need of something to carry them in this bag has undergone alot in a few months and has handled great my husband is a little rough so i was a little worried it wouldn't keep up with him for how cheap it is but if anything this bag looks brand new still and has keep his knifes safe its just a very good buy if your in a busy kitchen and gets thrown around alot and its very cheap he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Christine denbo

customer_reviews.title: Great iknife bag for work if you don't need more ...
customer_reviews.text: Great iknife bag for work if you don't need more than a few things with you on a regular basis. It zips closed and opens flat. I can fit a Chef knife. Serrated Bread Knive 2 pairing knives a small steel and though it's at the limit if I need them - floating around inside a reemer and peeler if I want. This isn't great if you need to carry more than 3 large knives with guards, then I'd recommend a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for the working folk who need a solid dependable ...
customer_reviews.text: are there other knife bags? great for the working folk who need a solid dependable bag.
customer_reviews.author: eugene king

customer_reviews.title: Great knife roll for cooks looking for a practical, yet inexpensive one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas! He was delighted since he recently got his knives, and previous knife roll stolen at work. I was impressed with how it came with straps. The 8 pockets for the knives are just enough for intermediate cooks. In addition, there are little pocker, and several card holder slots in first layer of the roll, which is great for adding small note books, and useful tools/utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this almost 2 years ago for my birthday, it works great except the velcro wares out over time and comes undone quite easily. Other than that it works great, holds all my knives and tools for work.
customer_reviews.author: Annika-Mie Racadio

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: neat bag ... but you need to buy a knife guard to keep your knifes from making a hole in the bag and it might take awhile for you to find the right way to put your knifes in and equipment so that the bag closes fine and dont end up uneven aside from that ...the bag does what its supposed to and your equipment will be always safe thanks to the added padding
customer_reviews.author: Damian M.

customer_reviews.title: I like this bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag overall, wished that the zippered pocket inside was made of a solis material not a mesh.
customer_reviews.author: CK1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag and perfect for the chef that needs their basic tools. I carry my chef knife, paring knife, spatula and just a few other small tools and this bag works great! Light weight and with the color, very easy to know its YOUR bag! Great quality for the price that you pay and I would highly recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Got it in my favorite color (and it matches my embroidered name on my chef's coat). Holds everything I need. I'm not a professional cook (yet), so I got this to carry my knives to a party I was catering. Makes me feel like a professional. Got lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Great durable product
customer_reviews.text: Great durable product. I love the color. Everyone in the kitchen knows who owns the kit. Easy to insert knives and I love the outer pocket for smaller items. Just the right size. Most chefs don't need more than this number of knives on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: the only problem is a bit short for long knife. beside that works well as intended .
customer_reviews.author: Haydee M.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient case.
customer_reviews.text: I like green and this case holds my knives just great. Recommend getting some edge guard for your knives so the edge doesn't cut through the material during storage and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Bit small
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend that's just beginning to work at sushi bar. Although it has multiple pockets, I don't think it will hold many big and/or long knives. For my friend's use, he only has two knives for now, it get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Scottyboy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pockets are a little small. I carry my cutco petite chef knife and it won't fit in the pocket so I just stick it in backwards and be careful when opening. One of the zippers doesn't move because the guides are bent. Might be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size for 5 knives
customer_reviews.text: Ok, We bought this roll to hold knives when we go on vacation and are renting an apartment. Light weight and holds a basic set of knives and a corkscrew.
customer_reviews.author: B H

customer_reviews.title: Love the red
customer_reviews.text: This knife roll is awesome+ it has all the pockets i need and i love how it has a zipper, velcro pads, and a hook to secure the knives from falling out. I used a black sharpie to draw on it. It looks awesome now
customer_reviews.author: GS_Gianco

customer_reviews.title: Way too small and short of pockets, don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pickets are the size of screwdriver handles and not knives. Either it’s made for tools or REALLY short knives. They’re not blade length for unsheathed knives like ALL knife bags are supposed to be. They’re also too small to fit chef knives, more like bread knife size.
customer_reviews.author: Thayer W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit the larger Mercer knives
customer_reviews.text: It was not exactly what I expected. My Mercer knives are too big to fit into the pockets.Overall it is well made and a safe way to transport knives.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Like no other
customer_reviews.text: Chef Husband loves his new knife bag! Great color waves for your unique on the go cook!
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Waves

customer_reviews.title: I will miss this great thing but need a case not a roll
customer_reviews.text: Almost three years later, it is falling apart, I will miss this great thing but need a case not a roll.
customer_reviews.author: Wyk

customer_reviews.title: I love the item
customer_reviews.text: I love the item! It's my first purchase at Amazon, and I have to admit that I was a little skeptic. But after a few days of waiting, I've received the package and it had been really what I had expected. The bag has been really helpful, and I've been using it everyday to work. It's the perfect size with enough pockets to put important knives and other accessories that I have to carry to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Big mama! Sturdy. Gets the job done. Not a fan of how it zips, because I can't go in and out of it easily, and it's hard to get long things into it unless I have it completely unzipped and opened.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Good for carrying a couple of knives
customer_reviews.text: This is good if you only need to carry a few pieces. It is long enough where you can even pack a long slicing knife or honing steel. It has enough slots for 5, but is bulky when you zip it closed. Also, a blade strap would have been nice for added stability.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: No padding at all
customer_reviews.text: The item name and description is incorrect. It clearly states that it is padded. Even the description mentions a foam core on the exterior. I checked mine when I received it today and there is absolutely no padding. It is only made out of nylon. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need to take for food preps; 5" Ultimate Edge sharpening steel, 10" butcher knife, 6 1/2" vegetable knife, 6 1/2" meat knife, 7" Komachi 2 knife ( all knives enclosed in BladeSafe plastic covers.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Macatiag Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Padded Knife Roll
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, she loves it and highly recommends this brand to any cooks or chefs interested in knife bags.
customer_reviews.author: BenWulf

customer_reviews.title: As a meat cutter at a big grocery store I ...
customer_reviews.text: As a meat cutter at a big grocery store I bring my knives home every night to make sure my knifes were the way I left them. Ironically the biggest advantage of this compact knife roll I always had it behind my bench seat in my truck. It came in handy for filleting fish and when friends were doing a big dinner I simply whipped out a professional set of knives and nothing was impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Aron Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: velro has already starting to come loose from the seams
customer_reviews.author: Daniel and Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy. The zipper is of good quality. It IS small so you can't carry too much but if you're just carrying the very minimal basics, this works. I have a long serrated bread knife that JUST made it in.
customer_reviews.author: CRIZAIDA RENDON

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: For a chef this bag is awesome it fits what you need and more durable and comfortable protects your items too
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Burks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much, I'm able to put all of he knives that I need plus extra such as the honing knife as well, I am able to put my wallet and phone charger in this bag and still have space left over...
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Vargas

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and perfect for a beginner and even ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my 12 year old who is just beginning her culinary experience. It's well built, easy to use and perfect for a beginner and even an old pro like myself.
customer_reviews.author: David Cronk

customer_reviews.title: its like 2mm
customer_reviews.text: Quality, nothing out of the ordinary, and does what it claims; hold your knives safe, although the "padding" is just for shows, its like 2mm thick
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. It's well made, roomy, and easy to carry comfortably. The only gripe I have is that the knives slide out of the pockets because there isn't anything to secure them. Maybe adding some elastic at the other end of each compartment would alleviate this issue and save some time having to constantly re-home wandering knives.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, love the extra ccompartment for pens and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good bag, love the extra ccompartment for pens and stuff. Really like the zip up for just the knives.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: it's nice and sturdy and I'm sure it's going to last ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time thank you! I just wanted the roll to protect my knives in my own kitchen, so it won't be carried around very much. There is many pockets, it's nice and sturdy and I'm sure it's going to last a while. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even had my bag for 24 hours or even placed a single knife in it yet- the zipper pull snapped off the second I opened the bag for the first time. If this is a sign of the quality of this bag, I’m wishing I didn’t spend $65.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Im not a chef , im just a cook but i love this bag !
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag ! Im a production cook in a buffet at a casino and i just needed something basic to put my knives and notepad , measuring cups , pens and thermometers! Its perfect ! The strap hasnt broke yet like some of the reviews say . Wish it was a bit bigger but its perfect for everything i need for my job !!
customer_reviews.author: Hopee

customer_reviews.title: best for traveling butchers
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my young nephew starting his career in as a butcher. he needs the best items for his job since he works for numerous places. always need to help young people.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: A great fit for this mobile home-chef
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this knife carrying case looking for something to haul my kitchen tools from friends house to family Thanksgiving get-togethers - it's gonna work great. The material is sturdy, the pockets appear to be well designed and care taken in the construction process to provide strong seams. For my home-chef needs the case is plenty big and will allow me easily cart my zester, mire-plainer, thermometer and favorite spatulas in addition to my lovely knives.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for quick access to your most used knives. Not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Chefbige

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. I use mine daily carrying my meat processing knives.
customer_reviews.author: melinda lucas

customer_reviews.title: Best knife roll I've had
customer_reviews.text: I am back to college for another degree in Pastry and although I already had a knife roll (8 pockets) it was too small for all the things I have to carry to class. This roll has 12 pockets and I could fit inside 4 icing spatulas, one large knife, a small knife, a 12" bread knife, a big brush, pastry tips and bags, 4 small and medium offset spatulas, measuring cups and spoons, apple corer, scissors, candy thermometer, and fondant rolling pin! And I still have some space for a couple more things. It brings a zipper to secure everything inside and a handle to carry them as a samurai!
customer_reviews.author: dianacobl

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Finally something easy to carry my knives when I go someplace. No more wrapping them up in paper towels and hoping they don't fall out and cut something.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: I like THIS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little knife bag. I just needed something small to carry my good knives to and from work, this one is nice. Nothing fancy, but it was worth the 20 bucks I spent! So glad there is a company out there that has a middle of the road bag.
customer_reviews.author: aravipa

customer_reviews.title: overall great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my olive messermeister 8 pocket knife roll and I am very pleased. The olive color is very handsome, the material is the stiff plastic you can expect for the price, and I can take my loose knives out of my underwear drawer! No more Russian roulette during the morning scramble to get to work on time. The zippers are definitely a little sketchy. So if you purchase this I recommend you are very ginger with them. But my initial judgement is it is a great buy. I'll let u know if it rips in a day but I've got faith!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Noglow

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely durable and as they stated. I wish I would have purchased the sleeves for my knives for extra protection in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Altamirano

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife roll
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic knife roll. Holds into place and hasn't torn it gotten cut by any of my knives and previously holders that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Kiesha Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: This bag is well designed and a good quality. I take it with me on catering ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is well designed and a good quality. I take it with me on catering jobs all the time, and Its held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Saphira

customer_reviews.title: Great Kinfe Roll for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am not a culinary professional looking for high dollar items. I needed something of good quality to carry the knives I use on a daily basis. This knife roll was perfect for what I needed. It is built well and holds my knives very securely.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted when I go to friends, bring my sharp knives and we cook together. Quality material and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for my high end chef and butcher knives when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar J.

customer_reviews.title: My son is a chef and this was a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a chef and this was a gift along with 3 Wusthof Classic chef's knives. He loves it and is proud to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R Wingate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little bag for the quick travel. holds just enough for the small jobs
customer_reviews.author: Chef Williams

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I probably got a bad one but handle is already ripping Besides that great bag
customer_reviews.author: steve v wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Roll - not what i thought i ordered
customer_reviews.text: This knife wrap is bigger than I thought I was getting - my friend has an 8-pocket roll and I thought that is what I was getting. This one is good though so I have kept it - it is good quality and folds and zips fine. If I was doing agency work or casual work in a number of different places I would probably get the smaller one, but I am happy with this one and the speed of the delivery and especially the cost-a LOT cheaper than in Australia.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag....My husband is a chef and he loves it....nice bright orange color!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TaurusGirl

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased messermeister knife rolls before and have been pleased with the quality and durability of their products
customer_reviews.text: The color slightly differs from the one pictured. I've purchased messermeister knife rolls before and have been pleased with the quality and durability of their products. I'm really hoping for the same with this one
customer_reviews.author: cassabanga

customer_reviews.title: Ready for war
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for everyday work. And if it rips just e-mail the manufacturer. They will send you a new one although it will take a while.
customer_reviews.author: EzE

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my knives protected and actually comes in my favorite color. I've been looking for an orange knife ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Keeps my knives protected and actually comes in my favorite color. I've been looking for an orange knife bag forever!
customer_reviews.author: sean Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good good, but the knives bang into each other unless you restrain them. A bar towel works well. The manufacturer really should have thought of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for transporting knifes back and forth in an organized ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for transporting knifes back and forth in an organized way. Great addition to tools of anyone in the culinary field.
customer_reviews.author: s.mashet

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Loving this knife roll! Strong and durable but also so cute. Fits all my knives and the steel. Also has a place for pens/temp stick, name tag, card slots and a mesh zippered compartment. Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: kaua

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. Can not beat the price for the quality of this item. My son likes to cook and he loves this thing. Definitely a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The slots were smaller than expected but the bag was well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Trinichick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a cook. Very good quality in a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, great value. Not sure why you'd need business card and or credit card holders but who really knows!
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: This purchase was a gift and they loved it. It holds all the knifes they need ...
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a gift and they loved it. It holds all the knifes they need for their job.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: nice product, wrong color shipped incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife roll, I bought this for my wife for Christmas and she loves it. My only issue is that I ordered the solid teal color and what shipped was the paisley print with a card inside that read teal. My wife doesn't mind the print, but it disappointed me that it didn't match other items I bought to go with the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bell

customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for cook son. He appeared pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Durablity is key here, nice material and zippers
customer_reviews.text: Love the tough material, durable zippers, fits my knives nicely, only problem is now i want more knives and will need a new bag soon lol the chef life.

customer_reviews.title: Small but great knife roll
customer_reviews.text: Great knife roll, I think I would have gotten a slightly larger one, but I’m very happy with it.

product_meta.title: Messermeister 5-Pocket Heavy Duty Nylon Padded Knife Roll, Luggage Grade and Water Resistant, Black
product_meta.description: Size:5-Pocket| Color:BlackMessermeister's Padded Knife Bag is the next generation of knife luggage from Messermeister. It features a fully lined inside with the addition of a foam core to the exteriors. This padded 100% Messermeister quality bag offers abrasion and water-resistant nylon 600 denier cloth with genuine YKK zippers. Messermeister is the high-quality functional knife and tool luggage of choice for both culinary professionals and home chefs alike. For all Messermeister Knife Luggage Products: Wipe with a damp sponge and water only Do not run through a washing machine or submerge in water Use Edge-Guards (not included) on your knives to protect the knife luggage fabric from cuts and knife blades from scratches
feature_bullets: The 5-Pocket Padded Knife Roll can hold up to an 18" knife and is great for both the professional and home chefs on the move
This padded bag is constructed with luggage-grade laminated, water-resistant 600-denier nylon and the highest quality metal YKK zippers that seals the bag closed on 3 sides
This Knife Roll has 5 Elasticized, reinforced pockets for culinary tools.
The dimensions when closed are 19.5"L x 5.25"W x 1"D

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
